questionTitle: Susan looked at ___ house which was for sale.
It was ___ large house, with five bedrooms.
There was ___ flight of four steps up to the wooden front door.
And there was ___ ivy growing around the doorway.
Inside, the hall smelled of ___ damp.
She entered the living-room, which still housed ___ former owner's furniture.
There was a settee, ___ armchair, a table and chairs.
___ huge chimney went up to the roof.
On the walls were ___ few old-fashioned paintings.
She imagined them to be ___ creations of the owners.
Before she even saw the rest of the house, she knew that it wasn't ___ house she wanted for her family.
